title: DNA Sequence
description: The ordered collection of unique chromosomes that define a holon's governance structure

holonId.description: ID of the holon this DNA belongs to (primary key, one DNA per holon)

chromosomeIds.description: Ordered list of chromosome IDs in the sequence

createdAt.description: Unix timestamp when DNA sequence was first created

version.description: Optimistic locking version number (incremented on each save)
